languages.text: Когда со всех сторон враги обрушились на протекторат фон Валанциус, лишь юный Эвейн не участвовал в этой жестокой расправе и принял под защиту многих беглецов, запятнавших себя службой изменни{mf|ку|це} Человечества.

When enemies came down on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, young Evayne was the only one to not take part in the savage assault, choosing instead to take in many refugees who had been stained by their service to the betrayer of Humanity.
languages.original_text: Когда со всех сторон враги обрушились на протекторат фон Валанциус, лишь юный Эвейн не участвовал в этой жестокой расправе и принял под защиту многих беглецов, запятнавших себя службой изменни{mf|ку|це} Человечества.

traits.locale_text: When enemies came down on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, young Evayne was the only one who did not take part in this savage lynching and instead took under his protection many refugees, whose service to the betrayer of Humanity marked them with a seal of mistrust.

When enemies came down on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, young Evayne was the only one who did not take part in this savage lynching and instead took under his protection many refugees, whose service to the betrayer of Humanity marked them with a seal of mistrust.

When enemies came down on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, young Evayne was the only one to not take part in the savage assault, choosing instead to take in many refugees who had been stained by their service to the betrayer of Humanity.

When enemies came down on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, young Evayne was the only one to not take part in the savage assault, choosing instead to take in many refugees who had been stained by their service to the betrayer of Humanity.

languages.text: 当敌人从四面八方攻击冯·瓦兰修斯王朝时，年轻的艾维尼是唯一一个没有参加这场野蛮袭击的人。在这场战争期间，他收留了许多因为侍奉人类叛徒而声名狼藉的难民。
languages.original_text: When enemies came down on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, young Evayne was the only one to not take part in the savage assault, choosing instead to take in many refugees who had been stained by their service to the betrayer of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: 当敌人从四面八方攻击冯·瓦兰修斯王朝时，年轻的艾维尼是唯一一个没有参加这场野蛮袭击的人。在这场战争期间，他收留了许多因为侍奉人类叛徒而声名狼藉的难民。

languages.text: Als das Protektorat von Valancius aus allen Richtungen von Feinden angegriffen wurde, war der junge Evayne der Einzige, der nicht an dem gnadenlosen Angriff teilnahm. Er entschied sich stattdessen, viele Flüchtlinge aufzunehmen, die sich durch ihren Dienst für {mf|den Verrätern|die Verräterin} an der Menschheit besudelt hatten.
languages.original_text: When enemies came down on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, young Evayne was the only one to not take part in the savage assault, choosing instead to take in many refugees who had been stained by their service to the betrayer of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Als das Protektorat von Valancius aus allen Richtungen von Feinden angegriffen wurde, war der junge Evayne der Einzige, der nicht an dem gnadenlosen Angriff teilnahm. Er entschied sich stattdessen, viele Flüchtlinge aufzunehmen, die sich durch ihren Dienst für {mf|den Verrätern|die Verräterin} an der Menschheit besudelt hatten.

languages.text: Lorsque des ennemis attaquèrent le protectorat von Valancius de toute part, le jeune Evayne fut le seul à ne pas prendre part à l'assaut. Il préféra accueillir de nombreux réfugiés considérés comme souillés par leur service sous les ordres {mf|du traître|de la traîtresse} de l'humanité.
languages.original_text: When enemies came down on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, young Evayne was the only one to not take part in the savage assault, choosing instead to take in many refugees who had been stained by their service to the betrayer of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque des ennemis attaquèrent le protectorat von Valancius de toute part, le jeune Evayne fut le seul à ne pas prendre part à l’assaut. Il préféra accueillir de nombreux réfugiés considérés comme souillés par leur service sous les ordres {mf|du traître|de la traîtresse} de l'humanité.

languages.text: Cuando los enemigos atacaron el protectorado von Valancius en todos los frentes, el joven Evayne fue el único que no participó en el brutal asalto, y en su lugar aceptó a muchos refugiados mancillados por su servicio a{mf|l| la} traidor{mf||a} a la Humanidad.
languages.original_text: When enemies came down on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, young Evayne was the only one to not take part in the savage assault, choosing instead to take in many refugees who had been stained by their service to the betrayer of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Cuando los enemigos atacaron el protectorado von Valancius en todos los frentes, el joven Evayne fue el único que no participó en el brutal asalto, y en su lugar aceptó a muchos refugiados mancillados por su servicio a{mf|l| la} traidor{mf||a} a la Humanidad.

languages.text: 敵が四方八方からフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領に襲いかかったとき、若きエヴァインだけは野蛮な襲撃に参加せず、代わりに人類の裏切り者への奉仕によって汚された多くの難民を受け入れることを選んだ。
languages.original_text: When enemies came down on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, young Evayne was the only one to not take part in the savage assault, choosing instead to take in many refugees who had been stained by their service to the betrayer of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: 敵が四方八方からフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領に襲いかかったとき、若きエヴァインだけは野蛮な襲撃に参加せず、代わりに人類の裏切り者への奉仕によって汚された多くの難民を受け入れることを選んだ。

languages.text: Genç Evayne, düşmanlar dört bir yandan von Valancius protektorasına saldırmaya başladığında bu yırtıcı saldırıda yer almayan tek kişiydi. Onun yerine İnsanlığa ihanet eden Hür Tacir'e hizmet etme lekesini taşıyan birçok sığınmacıyı kurtarmayı tercih etti.
languages.original_text: When enemies came down on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, young Evayne was the only one to not take part in the savage assault, choosing instead to take in many refugees who had been stained by their service to the betrayer of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Düşmanlar dört bir yandan von Valancius protektorasına saldırmaya başladığında, genç Evayne bu yırtıcı saldırıda yer almayan tek kişiydi. Onun yerine, İnsanlığa ihanet eden kişinin hizmetinde bulundukları için lekelenen birçok sığınmacıyı kurtarmayı tercih etti.
